channel.title: SMF 76 Subtype 1 on IBM SMF Explorer
channel.description: Recent content in SMF 76 Subtype 1 on IBM SMF Explorer

item.title: Field - all_req
item.description: ALL OPTIONS REQUESTED Map: SMF76B Based on: opt Description ALL OPTIONS REQUESTED Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field opt.

item.title: Field - altvm
item.description: Running under an alternate virtual machine environment Map: SMF76PRO Based on: fla Description Running under an alternate virtual machine environment Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field fla.

item.title: Field - arch_mode
item.description: System in z/ARCH mode Map: SMF76PRO Based on: prf Description System in z/ARCH mode Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field prf.

item.title: Field - avg
item.description: ACCUMULATED VALUE USED TO COMPUTE THE AVERAGE STANDARD DEVIATION (VALID IF BIT 2 OR BIT 5 OF SMF76OPT IS SET) Map: SMF76B Based on: SMF76AVG Description ACCUMULATED VALUE USED TO COMPUTE THE AVERAGE STANDARD DEVIATION (VALID IF BIT 2 OR BIT 5 OF SMF76OPT IS SET)

item.title: Field - avr_req
item.description: AVERAGE REQUESTED Map: SMF76B Based on: opt Description AVERAGE REQUESTED Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field opt.

item.title: Field - bfy
item.description: SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE Record: SMF76S1 Based on: flg Description SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field flg.

item.title: Field - boost_class
item.description: Boost class is set at end of interval, valid only when zIIP boost and/or Speed boost is active: 001 IPL, 010 Shutdown, 011 Recovery Process Map: SMF76PRO Based on: fla Description Boost class is set at end of interval, valid only when zIIP boost and/or Speed boost is active: 001 IPL, 010 Shutdown, 011 Recovery Process Post-Processed Flags postprocessor for multiple bit mapping.

item.title: Field - cnv
item.description: Data converted from version 2 Map: SMF76PRO Based on: fla Description Data converted from version 2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field fla.

item.title: Field - cyc
item.description: Sampling cycle length Map: SMF76PRO Based on: SMF76CYC Description Sampling cycle length

item.title: Field - dat
item.description: Date monitor interval start Map: SMF76PRO Based on: SMF76DAT Description Date monitor interval start

item.title: Field - dat_facility1
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 1 Map: SMF76PRO Based on: prf Description Enhanced DAT facility 1 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field prf.

item.title: Field - dat_facility2
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 2 Map: SMF76PRO Based on: prf Description Enhanced DAT facility 2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field prf.

item.title: Field - date
item.description: Date of Record Record: SMF76S1 Based on: SMF76DTE

item.title: Field - dln
item.description: LENGTH OF FIELD SAMPLED Map: SMF76B Based on: SMF76DLN Description LENGTH OF FIELD SAMPLED

item.title: Field - dte
item.description: DATE RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF76S1 Based on: SMF76DTE Description DATE RECORD WRITTEN

item.title: Field - end_value_req
item.description: END VALUE REQUESTED Map: SMF76B Based on: opt Description END VALUE REQUESTED Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field opt.

item.title: Field - env
item.description: END VALUE OF CONTENTS OF FIELD (VALID IF BIT 4 OR BIT 5 OF SMF76OPT IS SET) Map: SMF76B Based on: SMF76ENV Description END VALUE OF CONTENTS OF FIELD (VALID IF BIT 4 OR BIT 5 OF SMF76OPT IS SET)

item.title: Field - esa
item.description: MVS/ESA IF ON Record: SMF76S1 Based on: flg Description MVS/ESA IF ON Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field flg.

item.title: Field - escon_ch
item.description: Equipped with ESCON channel Map: SMF76PRO Based on: prf Description Equipped with ESCON channel Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field prf.

item.title: Field - escon_dir
item.description: ESCON Director in configuration Map: SMF76PRO Based on: prf Description ESCON Director in configuration Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field prf.

item.title: Field - expanded_stor
item.description: System has expanded storage Map: SMF76PRO Based on: prf Description System has expanded storage Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field prf.

item.title: Field - fla
item.description: Flags Map: SMF76PRO Based on: SMF76FLA Description Flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description cnv 0 Data converted from version 2 invalid_samples 1 Invalid samples to be skipped m3r 2 Record was written by RMF Monitor III interval_smf_control 3 Interval was under SMF control lower_service_level 4 SMF record converted to lower service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR.

item.title: Field - flg
item.description: SYSTEM INDICATOR FLAGS Record: SMF76S1 Based on: SMF76FLG Description SYSTEM INDICATOR FLAGS Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description rrf 0 NEW RECORD FORMAT sut 1 SUBTYPES USED v4 3 MVS/ESA V4 IF ON esa 4 MVS/ESA IF ON vxa 5 MVS/XA IF ON os 6 OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 bfy 7 SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE

item.title: Field - gie
item.description: Projected gathering interval end GMT time Map: SMF76PRO Based on: SMF76GIE Description Projected gathering interval end GMT time

item.title: Field - higher_service_level
item.description: SMF record converted to higher release or service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Map: SMF76PRO Based on: fla Description SMF record converted to higher release or service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field fla.

item.title: Field - iet
item.description: Interval expiration time token Map: SMF76PRO Based on: SMF76IET Description Interval expiration time token

item.title: Field - iml
item.description: Indicates the type of processor complex on which data measurements were taken. X'03’ = 9672, zSeries Map: SMF76PRO Based on: SMF76IML Description Indicates the type of processor complex on which data measurements were taken. X'03’ = 9672, zSeries

item.title: Field - int
item.description: Duration of monitor interval Map: SMF76PRO Based on: SMF76INT Description Duration of monitor interval

item.title: Field - interval_smf_control
item.description: Interval was under SMF control Map: SMF76PRO Based on: fla Description Interval was under SMF control Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field fla.

item.title: Field - invalid_samples
item.description: Invalid samples to be skipped Map: SMF76PRO Based on: fla Description Invalid samples to be skipped Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field fla.

item.title: Field - ips
item.description: IPS CHANGE OCCURRED (AFTER INITIALIZATION) Map: SMF76B Based on: opt Description IPS CHANGE OCCURRED (AFTER INITIALIZATION) Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field opt.

item.title: Field - ist
item.description: Time monitor interval start Map: SMF76PRO Based on: SMF76IST Description Time monitor interval start

item.title: Field - len
item.description: SMF RECORD LENGTH. ZERO AFTER GRBSMFR REASSEMBLY Record: SMF76S1 Based on: SMF76LEN Description SMF RECORD LENGTH. ZERO AFTER GRBSMFR REASSEMBLY

item.title: Field - lgo
item.description: Offset GMT to local time Map: SMF76PRO Based on: SMF76LGO Description Offset GMT to local time

item.title: Field - lower_service_level
item.description: SMF record converted to lower service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Map: SMF76PRO Based on: fla Description SMF record converted to lower service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field fla.

item.title: Field - lpb
item.description: LPB - ID TRACE REQUESTED Map: SMF76B Based on: op1 Description LPB - ID TRACE REQUESTED Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field op1.

item.title: Field - lpb_end
item.description: LPB TRACE REQUEST ENDED Map: SMF76B Based on: op1 Description LPB TRACE REQUEST ENDED Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field op1.

item.title: Field - m3r
item.description: Record was written by RMF Monitor III Map: SMF76PRO Based on: fla Description Record was written by RMF Monitor III Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field fla.

item.title: Field - max
item.description: MAX. VALUE OF CONTENTS OF FIELD DURING INTERVAL (VALID IF BIT 1 OR BIT 5 OF SMF76OPT IS SET) Map: SMF76B Based on: SMF76MAX Description MAX. VALUE OF CONTENTS OF FIELD DURING INTERVAL (VALID IF BIT 1 OR BIT 5 OF SMF76OPT IS SET)

item.title: Field - max_req
item.description: MAXIMUM REQUESTED Map: SMF76B Based on: opt Description MAXIMUM REQUESTED Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field opt.

item.title: Field - mfv
item.description: RMF version number Map: SMF76PRO Based on: SMF76MFV Description RMF version number

item.title: Field - min
item.description: MIN. VALUE OF CONTENTS OF FIELD DURING INTERVAL (VALID IF BIT 0 OR BIT 5 OF SMF76OPT IS SET) Map: SMF76B Based on: SMF76MIN Description MIN. VALUE OF CONTENTS OF FIELD DURING INTERVAL (VALID IF BIT 0 OR BIT 5 OF SMF76OPT IS SET)

item.title: Field - min_req
item.description: MINIMUM REQUESTED Map: SMF76B Based on: opt Description MINIMUM REQUESTED Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field opt.

item.title: Field - mvs
item.description: MVS software level (consists of an acronym and the version, release, and modification level - ZVvvrrmm) Map: SMF76PRO Based on: SMF76MVS Description MVS software level (consists of an acronym and the version, release, and modification level - ZVvvrrmm)

item.title: Field - nam
item.description: FIELD NAME Map: SMF76B Based on: SMF76NAM Description FIELD NAME

item.title: Field - name_is_domain
item.description: NAME IS A DOMAIN TABLE FIELD Map: SMF76B Based on: opt Description NAME IS A DOMAIN TABLE FIELD Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field opt.

item.title: Field - num
item.description: NUMBER OF SET ENTRIES THAT FOLLOW THE TOTAL VALUES Map: SMF76A Based on: SMF76NUM Description NUMBER OF SET ENTRIES THAT FOLLOW THE TOTAL VALUES

item.title: Field - oil
item.description: Original interval length as defined in the session or by SMF (in seconds) Map: SMF76PRO Based on: SMF76OIL Description Original interval length as defined in the session or by SMF (in seconds)

item.title: Field - op1
item.description: FLAGS Map: SMF76B Based on: SMF76OP1 Description FLAGS Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description lpb 0 LPB - ID TRACE REQUESTED lpb_end 1 LPB TRACE REQUEST ENDED valid_data 2 ON = VALID DATA

item.title: Field - opt
item.description: FLAGS(OPTIONS SPECIFIED ON TRACE INPUT IN RMF PARMLIB MEMBER FOR THE FIELD NAME) Map: SMF76B Based on: SMF76OPT Description FLAGS(OPTIONS SPECIFIED ON TRACE INPUT IN RMF PARMLIB MEMBER FOR THE FIELD NAME) Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description min_req 0 MINIMUM REQUESTED max_req 1 MAXIMUM REQUESTED avr_req 2 AVERAGE REQUESTED std_dev_req 3 STD. DEV. REQUESTED end_value_req 4 END VALUE REQUESTED all_req 5 ALL OPTIONS REQUESTED ips 6 IPS CHANGE OCCURRED (AFTER INITIALIZATION) name_is_domain 7 NAME IS A DOMAIN TABLE FIELD

item.title: Field - os
item.description: OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 Record: SMF76S1 Based on: flg Description OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field flg.

item.title: Field - prd
item.description: Product name Map: SMF76PRO Based on: SMF76PRD Description Product name

item.title: Field - prf
item.description: Processor flags Map: SMF76PRO Based on: SMF76PRF Description Processor flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description expanded_stor 0 System has expanded storage escon_ch 1 Equipped with ESCON channel escon_dir 2 ESCON Director in configuration arch_mode 3 System in z/ARCH mode zaap_inst 4 At least one zAAP is currently installed ziip_inst 5 At least one zIIP is currently installed dat_facility1 6 Enhanced DAT facility 1 dat_facility2 7 Enhanced DAT facility 2

item.title: Field - prl
item.description: LENGTH OF RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF76S1 Based on: SMF76PRL Description LENGTH OF RMF PRODUCT SECTION

item.title: Field - prn
item.description: NUMBER OF RMF PRODUCT SECTIONS Record: SMF76S1 Based on: SMF76PRN Description NUMBER OF RMF PRODUCT SECTIONS

item.title: Field - prs
item.description: OFFSET TO RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF76S1 Based on: SMF76PRS Description OFFSET TO RMF PRODUCT SECTION

item.title: Field - ptn
item.description: PR/SM partition number Map: SMF76PRO Based on: SMF76PTN Description PR/SM partition number

item.title: Field - ral
item.description: Length of reassembly area. Area consists of a fixed header and a variable number of information blocks. Length depends on the record type/subtype, but is fixed for a specific type/subtype Map: SMF76PRO Based on: SMF76RAL Description Length of reassembly area. Area consists of a fixed header and a variable number of information blocks. Length depends on the record type/subtype, but is fixed for a specific type/subtype

item.title: Field - ran
item.description: Number of reassembly area. This field is used to indicate whether SMF record is broken. If 0, record is not broken. If 1, record is broken. Offset and length are only valid if SMFxxRAN is 1. Reassembly area is only present in broken records. Map: SMF76PRO Based on: SMF76RAN Description Number of reassembly area. This field is used to indicate whether SMF record is broken. If 0, record is not broken.

item.title: Field - rao
item.description: Offset to reassembly area relative to start of RMF product section Map: SMF76PRO Based on: SMF76RAO Description Offset to reassembly area relative to start of RMF product section

item.title: Field - rrf
item.description: NEW RECORD FORMAT Record: SMF76S1 Based on: flg Description NEW RECORD FORMAT Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field flg.

item.title: Field - rty
item.description: RECORD TYPE Record: SMF76S1 Based on: SMF76RTY Description RECORD TYPE

item.title: Field - sam
item.description: Number of samples Map: SMF76PRO Based on: SMF76SAM Description Number of samples

item.title: Field - seg
item.description: SEGMENT DESCRIPTOR Record: SMF76S1 Based on: SMF76SEG Description SEGMENT DESCRIPTOR

item.title: Field - sid
item.description: SYSTEM ID FROM INSTALLATION Record: SMF76S1 Based on: SMF76SID Description SYSTEM ID FROM INSTALLATION

item.title: Field - sln
item.description: LENGTH OF A SET Map: SMF76B Based on: SMF76SLN Description LENGTH OF A SET

item.title: Field - snm
item.description: System name for current system as defined in CVTSNAME Map: SMF76PRO Based on: SMF76SNM Description System name for current system as defined in CVTSNAME

item.title: Field - speed_boost
item.description: Speed boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF76PRO Based on: fla Description Speed boost was active during entire interval Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 10 of field fla.

item.title: Field - srl
item.description: SMF record level Map: SMF76PRO Based on: SMF76SRL Description SMF record level

item.title: Field - ssi
item.description: SUBSYSTEM ID (RMF ) Record: SMF76S1 Based on: SMF76SSI Description SUBSYSTEM ID (RMF )

item.title: Field - ssl
item.description: SAMPLES PER SET FOR LAST SET IN INTERVAL Map: SMF76B Based on: SMF76SSL Description SAMPLES PER SET FOR LAST SET IN INTERVAL

item.title: Field - sss
item.description: SAMPLES PER SET Map: SMF76B Based on: SMF76SSS Description SAMPLES PER SET

item.title: Field - std
item.description: SUM OF SQUARES USED TO COMPUTE STANDARD DEVIATION (VALID IF BIT 3 OR BIT 5 OF SMF76OPT IS SET) Map: SMF76B Based on: SMF76STD Description SUM OF SQUARES USED TO COMPUTE STANDARD DEVIATION (VALID IF BIT 3 OR BIT 5 OF SMF76OPT IS SET)

item.title: Field - std_dev_req
item.description: STD. DEV. REQUESTED Map: SMF76B Based on: opt Description STD. DEV. REQUESTED Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field opt.

item.title: Field - sty
item.description: SUBTYPE Record: SMF76S1 Based on: SMF76STY Description SUBTYPE

item.title: Field - subtype1_variable_trace_data_section_array
item.description: Record: SMF76S1 Based on: SMF76_SUBTYPE1_VARIABLE_TRACE_DATA_SECTION_ARRAY

item.title: Field - sut
item.description: SUBTYPES USED Record: SMF76S1 Based on: flg Description SUBTYPES USED Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field flg.

item.title: Field - syn
item.description: SYNC value in seconds Map: SMF76PRO Based on: SMF76SYN Description SYNC value in seconds

item.title: Field - tcl
item.description: LENGTH OF TRACE CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF76S1 Based on: SMF76TCL Description LENGTH OF TRACE CONTROL SECTION

item.title: Field - tcn
item.description: NUMBER OF TRACE CONTROL SECTIONS Record: SMF76S1 Based on: SMF76TCN Description NUMBER OF TRACE CONTROL SECTIONS

item.title: Field - tcs
item.description: OFFSET TO TRACE CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF76S1 Based on: SMF76TCS Description OFFSET TO TRACE CONTROL SECTION

item.title: Field - tdl
item.description: LENGTH OF TRACE DATA ENTRY SECTION Record: SMF76S1 Based on: SMF76TDL Description LENGTH OF TRACE DATA ENTRY SECTION

item.title: Field - tdn
item.description: NUMBER OF TRACE DATA ENTRY SECT. Record: SMF76S1 Based on: SMF76TDN Description NUMBER OF TRACE DATA ENTRY SECT.

item.title: Field - tds
item.description: OFFSET TO TRACE DATA ENTRY SECTION Record: SMF76S1 Based on: SMF76TDS Description OFFSET TO TRACE DATA ENTRY SECTION

item.title: Field - time
item.description: Time of Record Record: SMF76S1 Based on: SMF76TME

item.title: Field - timestamp
item.description: Record Timestamp Record: SMF76S1 Based on: date, time Description Timestamp from SMF data Post-Processed This field is combined from a date and a time field to form a timestamp.

item.title: Field - tme
item.description: TIME RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF76S1 Based on: SMF76TME Description TIME RECORD WRITTEN

item.title: Field - trn
item.description: NUMBER OF TRIPLETS IN THIS REC Record: SMF76S1 Based on: SMF76TRN Description NUMBER OF TRIPLETS IN THIS REC

item.title: Field - v4
item.description: MVS/ESA V4 IF ON Record: SMF76S1 Based on: flg Description MVS/ESA V4 IF ON Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field flg.

item.title: Field - valid_data
item.description: ON = VALID DATA Map: SMF76B Based on: op1 Description ON = VALID DATA Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field op1.

item.title: Field - vfl
item.description: LENGTH OF VARIABLE FORMAT SET Record: SMF76S1 Based on: SMF76VFL Description LENGTH OF VARIABLE FORMAT SET

item.title: Field - vfn
item.description: NUMBER OF VARIABLE FORMAT SET Record: SMF76S1 Based on: SMF76VFN Description NUMBER OF VARIABLE FORMAT SET

item.title: Field - vfs
item.description: OFFSET TO VARIABLE FORMAT SET Record: SMF76S1 Based on: SMF76VFS Description OFFSET TO VARIABLE FORMAT SET

item.title: Field - vxa
item.description: MVS/XA IF ON Record: SMF76S1 Based on: flg Description MVS/XA IF ON Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field flg.

item.title: Field - xnm
item.description: Sysplex name as defined in ECVTSPLX Map: SMF76PRO Based on: SMF76XNM Description Sysplex name as defined in ECVTSPLX

item.title: Field - zaap_inst
item.description: At least one zAAP is currently installed Map: SMF76PRO Based on: prf Description At least one zAAP is currently installed Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field prf.

item.title: Field - ziip_boost
item.description: zIIP boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF76PRO Based on: fla Description zIIP boost was active during entire interval Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 9 of field fla.

item.title: Field - ziip_inst
item.description: At least one zIIP is currently installed Map: SMF76PRO Based on: prf Description At least one zIIP is currently installed Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field prf.
